reference.title: Watchpoint debug events
reference.shortdesc: In the Cortexâ€‘A76 core, watchpoint debug events are always synchronous.

section.p: Memory hint instructions and cache clean operations, except DC ZVA and DC IVAC, do not generate watchpoint debug events. Store exclusive instructions generate a watchpoint debug event even when the check for the control of exclusive monitor fails. Atomic CAS instructions generate a watchpoint debug event even when the compare operation fails.
